item.title: Lexie add a quote by Lee Eun
item.description:
"Live the life you choose and enjoy the happiness and regret that comes with that life.
~Yong-Kum" -- Lee Eun

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Lauren Kate
item.description: "What if the person you were meant to be with could never be yours?" -- Lauren Kate

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Mizuki Nomura
item.description: "Yes. We will live the rest of our lives in hell. It's not so bad: as long as you're prepared for it, you can live anywhere." -- Mizuki Nomura

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Thea Harrison
Lexie add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "Yer a good lad, Atticus, mowin’ me lawn and killin’ what Brits come around." -- Kevin Hearne

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Jerome K. Jerome
item.description: "I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours." -- Jerome K. Jerome

item.title: Lexie add a quote by David Weber
item.description: "It was rumored she held grudges till they died of old age, then had them stuffed and mounted." -- David Weber

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brent Weeks
item.description: "Love is a fragile, corruptible thing. And yet I have seen it evince a curious strength. It is beyond any comprehension Love is a weakness that once in a great while triumphs over strength. " -- Brent Weeks

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brent Weeks
item.description: "Assassination is an art, milord. And I am the city's most accomplished artist." -- Brent Weeks

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brent Weeks
item.description: "The perfect killer has no friends. Only targets." -- Brent Weeks

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brent Weeks
item.description: "Life is meaningless, when we take a life we take nothing of value." -- Brent Weeks

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brent Weeks
item.description: "The perfect killer has no conscience." -- Brent Weeks

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description:
"You see, that is the sad, sorry, terrible thing about sarcasm.
It's really funny." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "My behavior is nonetheless, deplorable. Unfortunately, I'm quite prone to such bouts of deplorability--take for instance, my fondness for reading books at the dinner table." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "I've always been very confident in my immaturity." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "If you're always on time, it implies that you never have anything better you should be doing. -Kelsier" -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "Unknowing ignorance is preferable to informed stupidity." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Rachel Vincent
item.description: "You just say the word, and I'll make the rest of the world go away. I'll take you someplace safe, where no one else can reach us." -- Rachel Vincent

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Rachel Vincent
item.description: "He shrugged, looking right into my eyes. "Right now, this is all I feel." He held our intertwined hands up for me to see and I wanted to look away, but I couldn't break the hold his gaze had on me, like he could see more than anyone else saw. Things I couldn't see myself." -- Rachel Vincent

item.title: Lexie add a quote by YUKAKO KABEI
item.description: "God is a man of such perfect, flawless character that he only watches over everyone equally -- the strong and the weak, the rich and the poor -- and never plays favorites or reaches His hand out to any of them. Oh, what a wonderful God. He can just drop dead." -- YUKAKO KABEI

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Maria V. Snyder
Lexie add a quote by Maria V. Snyder
item.description: "When the effort fails, is it worth the cost?" -- Maria V. Snyder

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Maria V. Snyder
item.description: "You can't let the past ruin your future." -- Maria V. Snyder

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Maria V. Snyder
item.description: "The past shouldn't be forgotten. It should be used as a guide for future situations and not used as a reason to avoid making difficult decisions. There was always a choice." -- Maria V. Snyder

item.title: Lexie add a quote by maria v. snyder
item.description: "You asked how I can be so calm. I don't have time not to be. I would like to grieve and worry and carry on, but that doesn't achieve results." -- maria v. snyder

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Maria V. Snyder
item.description: "Nothing says you care for me better than offering to torture my enemies." -- Maria V. Snyder

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Maria V. Snyder
item.description: "Knowing and believing are sometimes hard to combine." -- Maria V. Snyder

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Maria V. Snyder
item.description: "Lying to yourself is easy, too. I know. It's much harder to stay and deal with consequences." -- Maria V. Snyder

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Maria V Snyder
item.description: "Schooling kids to play fair, fials to prepare them for adulthood." -- Maria V Snyder

item.title: Lexie add a quote by Maria V. Snyder
item.description: "Only Valek would consider an attempt on my life a fascinating diversion." -- Maria V. Snyder
